channel.title: Moog Minimoog patch!
channel.description: Sharing for your enjoyment my latest patch... Minimoog. (Actually, more like the Minimoog Re-issue or Boog, because I included the LFO.) Controls are set to emulate Rick Wakeman's 'Catherine' patch (as per The Lengend's version). Controls mostly match those of the Minimoog, but in if you try to copy a MM patch, you'll find the knob positions don't necessarily correspond to the real thing. Cheers!Minimoog.axp (58.1 KB)

item.title: Moog Minimoog patch!
item.dc:creator: @BrianA
item.description:
@BrianA wrote:

Sharing for your enjoyment my latest patch... Minimoog.

(Actually, more like the Minimoog Re-issue or Boog, because I included the LFO.)

Controls are set to emulate Rick Wakeman's 'Catherine' patch (as per The Lengend's version). Controls mostly match those of the Minimoog, but in if you try to copy a MM patch, you'll find the knob positions don't necessarily correspond to the real thing.

Cheers!Minimoog.axp (58.1 KB)
